Highschool student Muhamad Nour al Muhammad was arrested by Syrian regime forces in July 2014. On August 27, 2020, his family was told he was registered as dead at the Civil Registry on July 15, 2015. SNHR believes he probably died due to torture.
#Syria

retweeted_status.full_text: Ruqaya, an 11-year-old girl, suffering from cerebral palsy,  lost her father and is displaced with her family to the IDP camps in N. #Syria, only worsening her suffering. Like millions of other displaced Syrians, existence is made worse by homelessness & the lack of necessities. https://t.co/LWUGcr0lan
